stories.fantasy_headline: Anker's Guild Unveils Wild Party Wagon for Festive Merriment!
stories.fantasy_story: The Artificers of Anker's Guild have crafted a bizarre yet wondrous artifact! This enchanted wagon carries a powerful vision crystal and magical sound amplifiers. It even includes enchanted trinkets for capturing voices, turning any gathering into a joyous celebration. It's truly a marvel of magical merriment.

stories.fantasy_headline: Discover the Finest Crystal Tablet for Carrying All Your Lore!
stories.fantasy_story: Seek the ideal crystal tablet of lore to carry a vast archive of tales in your satchel. Unlike a simple scrying mirror, these enchanted tablets offer a calming script and gentle glow, easing the eyes of weary scholars. Many feature customizable glow enchantments for perfect reading.
